front.title: Timely Completion for Internet Messaging Services

abstract.t: This specification provides a way to request timely completion forInternet mail delivery, for services such as facsimile and voicemessaging. Traditional Internet mail uses a _postal_ mail model,with normal delivery having an indeterminate gap between deliveryinto a mailbox and processing by the recipient. Timely completionadds a timelines service feature and extends delivery processingall the way to the recipient. This specification provides adeterministic service quality response, while preserving most ofthe traditional roles and responsibilities of the agents involvedin email transfers.
